channel.title: Original 194 Client Not Working
channel.description:
Hello I just downloaded the original 194 client. Not a lookalike. It included a cache. Yet when I run it I end up with this:
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2gt6w5s.png[/img]
PLEASE HELP ME!!!!!

item.title: Original 194 Client Not Working
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Cyberus, post:6, topic:528228”][quote author=Docent link=topic=646977.msg4350833#msg4350833 date=1376613958]

you have to disable the update server and change the directory the cache is loaded at.

i released a refactored 194 client here and the 194 client loader here btw

I never found your release, even through hours of google. No matter. Thank you so much. I’ll respond as soon as I get a result.

EDIT: How do I run it?/compile

and what does the loader do? Thanks

use an IDE such as Eclipse

the loader downloads and executes ‘runescape.jar’, i.e the refactored client I posted above

I use TextMate… will that suffice?

Also is it possible to just run it?
[/quote]

i’m not familiar with that but after a quick Google search it looks to just be a text editor. there’s a Mac version of Eclipse though, and I really recommend it.

you can just run and compile it with an IDE[/quote]

It also runs single files unless the file calls other files. It’s also my preferred text editor and programming tool. Im not familiar with clients at all. Is it possible to add shell files to the 194 client to run it?

Read full topic
